abstract: Shares of Facebook tumbled as much as 3 percent on Wednesday after the first big wave of analyst reports on the social network arrived, with largely mixed feelings about the stock.
snippet: Shares of Facebook tumbled as much as 3 percent on Wednesday after the first big wave of analyst reports on the social network arrived, with largely mixed feelings about the stock.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Facebook tumbled as much as 3 percent on Wednesday after the first big wave of analyst reports on the social network arrived, with largely mixed feelings about the stock.

headline.main: Facebook Shares Falter as Analysts Split Their Verdicts

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
